channel.title: How to run a RSPS on a mac
channel.description:
I've been trying to figure thisout myself for about 2 weeks now. Everyone kept saying do the same as what you would to with the client, but they were wrong. I will be uploading a video once i get home from school aswell. :)
Ok so lets get started.
[size=15pt][center][b]Step 1: Download your server source and client[/b][/center][/size]
[center][b]You can download a source/client here[/b][/center] [center]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html[/center]
[center][b]503-508 Download List[/b][/center] [center]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300371.0.html[/center]
[size=15pt][b]Step 2[/b][/size] After you have downloaded you source extract it using your suffit expander. If you dont already have it witch you should download it here: http://my.smithmicro.com/mac/stuffit/expander.html
Ok now heres where you might have trouble. If you have a 317 server then make a new folder and put the folder with the server files into the new folder you have recently created. Once done with that put ur run.bat into the folder you have recently created aswell.
Oh shit im at school so ill finish in an hour when i get home lol . teacher walks in *
